products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Unilux PVC Blackout Grey Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £10.04 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Bella Blackout Graphite Roller Blind gives you the best of two worlds – a bright and open window space in the daytime, then total peace and privacy whenever you require it. Thanks to the blackout backed fabric this modern grey roller blind is highly efficient at blocking light and retaining a cosy and calming atmosphere indoors.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX0910 Fabric Colour: Grey Material: Fiberglass core laminated with PVC layered coating Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Unilux Grey (Moisture Resistant)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Unilux Grey (Moisture Resistant) Bathroom Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Bathroom Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3048mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Joins: Blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric Composition: PVC
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
